title: Fully furnished 3 Beds,2 Baths house Ready for Rent
posting_body: Fully furnished Airbnb Operated single family home in the heart of Hollywood Beach.
This wonderful pool home has all the qualities to become a SuperHost on Airbnb.
Buyer will inherit bookings up to January 2023.
Backyard with pergola great for entertaining guests by the pool.
Friendly neighborhood and close access to the beaches & highways!
3 bedroom / 2 bathroom with an additional efficiency in the back for Double Income!
The property was completely remodeled and comes fully furnished so you can start Airbnb'ing from day 1!
New Roof (2021), New Circular Driveway (2021), New Pool Heater (2022).
The efficiency is in front of the house, with a complete separate entrance.
It has a full-size kitchen, bedroom, living room and bathroom.
The Airbnb area is a 3/1 fully furnished.
